speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections, may I speak with Sarah Johnson?

speaker: Customer
text: Uh, I think you have the wrong number. This is Jason.

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for the mix-up, but I need to discuss an outstanding balance on the account with American Airlines.

speaker: Customer
text: I really don't know anything about that. I don’t even know a Sarah Johnson.

speaker: Agent
text: I appreciate your patience. Let me take note of this error.

speaker: Customer
text: No problem, just make sure to update your records.

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, I'll make sure this number is removed. Thank you for your understanding.

speaker: Customer
text: You're welcome. Have a good day.
